str2: In a circle round, round about. Adverb from the same as kukloi; from the circle, i.e. All around.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From thrao; a stately seat; by implication, power or a potentate.
Twenty. Of uncertain affinity; a score.
From thrao; a stately seat; by implication, power or a potentate.
And, even, also, namely.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From thrao; a stately seat; by implication, power or a potentate.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To sit, be seated, enthroned; I dwell, reside. From kata; and hemai; to sit down; figuratively, to remain, reside.
Twenty. Of uncertain affinity; a score.
Comparative of presbus; older; as noun, a senior; specially, an Israelite Sanhedrist or Christian 'presbyter'.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: From peri and ballo; to throw all around, i.e. Invest.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
White, bright, brilliant. From luke; white.
And, even, also, namely.
Golden, made of gold, adorned with gold. From chrusos; made of gold.
A crown, garland, honor, glory. From an apparently primary stepho; a chaplet, literally or figuratively.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From the primary kapto; the head, literally or figuratively.
